1.description: Introduction to numbers, basic addition and subtraction.
1.detailedDescription: Students will learn to identify and write numbers, as well as perform basic addition and subtraction operations.

2.description: Building on addition and subtraction with introduction to basic shapes.
2.detailedDescription: This course reinforces addition and subtraction skills while introducing students to basic geometric shapes and their properties.

3.description: Focus on multiplication and division, fractions, and basic measurements.
3.detailedDescription: Students will learn multiplication and division, understand the concept of fractions, and explore basic measurement techniques.

4.description: Introduction to decimals, advanced fractions, and basic geometry.
4.detailedDescription: This course covers decimals and advanced fraction concepts, along with an introduction to geometric figures and their attributes.

5.description: Advanced operations with whole numbers and fractions, and introduction to data.
5.detailedDescription: Students will tackle more complex operations with whole numbers and fractions, while also learning how to collect, organize, and interpret data.

6.description: Comprehensive course covering basic arithmetic, fractions, decimals, and introduction to geometry.
6.detailedDescription: This course provides a solid foundation in arithmetic, including the use of fractions and decimals, while introducing basic geometric concepts.

7.description: Advanced course building on Mathematics 6, focusing on integers, ratios, proportions, and basic algebra concepts.
7.detailedDescription: Students will explore integers, ratios, and proportions, and begin their journey into basic algebraic concepts and operations.

8.description: Exploration of functions, geometry, and statistics.
8.detailedDescription: This course focuses on the study of functions and their applications, along with an introduction to geometric principles and basic statistics.

9.description: Introduction to algebra, focusing on solving equations and graphing linear functions.
9.detailedDescription: Students will learn the foundational concepts of algebra, including solving equations and graphing linear functions on a coordinate plane.

10.description: Advanced algebra concepts including polynomials, rational expressions, and quadratic functions.
10.detailedDescription: This course delves deeper into algebraic concepts, covering polynomials, rational expressions, and solving quadratic equations.

11.description: Preparation for calculus, covering functions, sequences, and limits.
11.detailedDescription: Students will explore various types of functions, sequences, and the fundamental concepts of limits in preparation for calculus.

12.description: Introduction to limits, derivatives, and integrals.
12.detailedDescription: This course introduces the concepts of limits, derivatives, and integrals, forming the foundation for advanced calculus topics.
